item.title: Mimi add a quote by Alexander Pope
item.description: "To err is human, to forgive, divine." -- Alexander Pope

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Anne Sexton
item.description: "As it has been said: Love and a cough cannot be concealed. Even a small cough. Even a small love." -- Anne Sexton

item.title: Mimi add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Love is something more stern and splendid than mere kindness." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Mortimer J. Adler
item.description: "In the case of good books, the point is not to see how many of them you can get through, but rather how many can get through to you." -- Mortimer J. Adler

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Kathleen Patel
item.description: "With ignorance comes fear- from fear comes bigotry. Education is the key to acceptance." -- Kathleen Patel

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Elizabeth Barrett Browning
item.description: "Earth's crammed with heaven... But only he who sees, takes off his shoes." -- Elizabeth Barrett Browning

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Napoleon Hill
item.description: "Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve." -- Napoleon Hill

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Robert J. Sawyer
item.description: "Learning to ignore things is one of the great paths to inner peace." -- Robert J. Sawyer

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Mimi add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "The Marines I have seen around the world have the cleanest bodies, the filthiest minds, the highest morale, and the lowest morals of any group of animals I have ever seen. Thank God for the United States Marine Corps!" -- Eleanor Roosevelt
